about_the_game:
Soundtrack of Interplanetary, also featured in the Enhanced Edition. Music by Vincent Parrish.

Tracks:

01 - Interplanetary
02 - War
03 - Defeat
04 - Conflict Stirs
05 - At Ease
06 - Ready Armaments
07 - Engage
08 - All or Nothing
09 - Rising Tension
10 - Expansion
11 - Take Aim
12 - Victory in Sight
13 - Final Push
14 - Zeroing In
15 - Loss Approaches
16 - Cannonade
17 - Victory
18 - Bonus 1
19 - Bonus 2
20 - Bonus 3
21 - Bonus 4
